definition: on the road/on a journey/road surface
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
The road means more than the destination./It is better to travel hopefully than to arrive.
pinyin: lu4 shang5 bi3 zhong1 dian3 geng4 you3 yi4 yi4

sentences.english: When I go dhave the long steep Road of Darkness.
sentences.chinese: 当我行走在黑暗而险峻的路上。

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算铲完整条路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: By putting the seven great nails on the narrow paths of samsara and nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 将七根大钉钉于轮回与涅盘之狭路上。

sentences.english: The trip west was hard. Many of the people died.
sentences.chinese: 这次西行的旅程非常艰苦，许多人死在了路上。

sentences.english: I would recite all that had been rehearsed on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 我会把在回家路上练习过的东西背诵一遍。

sentences.english: Kim tells her that she is on her way and they hang up.
sentences.chinese: 金姆说她就在去反恐组的路上，然后挂断了电话。

sentences.english: He died on the way to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 后来他还是死在了去医院的路上。

sentences.english: Fiesco, set free, encounters Paolo on his way to execution.
sentences.chinese: 菲耶斯科获释，并在与被押赴刑场的保罗在路上相遇。

sentences.english: The envelope must be on a trail somewhere around Tillicum Village.
sentences.chinese: 信封一定就在提利坎姆村附近的一条小路上。

sentences.english: Darren is battering a guy on the corner and the cops are on their way.
sentences.chinese: 达伦在街角打人，警察已经在路上了。

sentences.english: As she drove home, Mrs. Cox thought about the class she had just left.
sentences.chinese: 科克斯夫人在驱车回家的路上想着她刚上完的这节课。

sentences.english: On the way home, several passersby wished me well.
sentences.chinese: 回去的路上，几个路过的人祝我好运。

sentences.english: In the tang sugar nervous and ChengXi explain yesterday nothing happened.
sentences.chinese: 在路上唐糖紧张的和程曦解释昨天什么也没发生。

sentences.english: The station is called Beijing Station and it is on the blue circle line.
sentences.chinese: 那一站是北京站，在蓝色环线地铁线路上。

sentences.english: Six light-minded girls are losing their passports and money on their way to Ibiza.
sentences.chinese: 六个头脑简单的女孩在去伊比萨的路上丢了护照和钱。

sentences.english: Inspired by the picture of a valkyrie I found on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 从网路上找到的北欧战神使女的图片得到的灵感。

definition: the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
along the way/the duration of a journey
person of the same profession/of the same trade, occupation or industry
